text: Hello! When I clone a blog post which has two featured images uploaded and the last uploaded selected as featured then in the cloned post the first uploaded image becomes featured image. Do someone has an idea?

Hi all, I am looking into visual feedback tools like <http://markup.io|markup.io> to use for our HubSpot dev and design team. Currently, <http://markup.io|markup.io> can not work with the HubSpot preview links, do you guys have any alternatives you use?
is there any way to set default content on a repeater module - in the design manager? Or do you have to be working locally to do that?
would be nice to be able to do that in the design manager ...

Hey <@U018H5X9MQU> I wrote that tutorial, thanks for checking it out!  Where are you getting stuck?  It’s definitely possible I have a bug in there so if you are seeing any errors, I’d love to get them fixed.

When using HubSpot video - there is a light gray screen that is added over the video - is there a way to remove this??? Here is the page I'm working on: <https://www.kontrolpayables.com/?hsCacheBuster=3079>
mid way down the page you will see the video with the screen on top - when you hover the video the screen is removed...
